title: Memoriesea Women's Elegant Casual Short Sleeve Work Party A-Line Dress with Pockets
description: Material:This dress is made of quality fabric 90%Polyester+10%Spandex,soft,stretchy and comfortable.

Occasion:Great for everyday look,going out,weekend,cocktail party,birthdays,dinner,prom,business office work,church,wedding guest,teaching clothes,mother's day gift.
US Size:S=USA 4-6;M=8-10;L=12-14;XL=16-18;XXL=18-20. Please check it before you buy!
Match:This dress with strappy heels,gold hoops,and a clutch for a sexy and elegant look that's perfect for wedding guests and other formal events.
